## TechCrunch & VentureBeat
HTTP GET requests to fetch the latest articles from tech news sitemap feeds.

Separates individual articles and filters to keep only the most relevant ones based on keywords (raised)

nodes.name: Sticky Note11

parameters.content:
## Extract URL
Since perplexity uses Llama which is not great at structured output - 2 step approach for a more reliable run

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note12

parameters.content:
## Collect data & write to airtable
Collecting all data to pass on to detailed company research and store information in airtable

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Extract structured data from report
Deep Research produces long text output. We use a parser here to make the information available in structured format. As the json structure is quite complex I am using a strong model and the Auto-fixing Output Parser

nodes.name: Prompts

assignments.name: user_prompt
assignments.value:
=I need comprehensive information about {{ $json.company_name }} that recently announced a {{ $json.funding_round }} funding round of {{ $json.funding_amount }}.  

Please research and compile the following:  

## Company Background  
- Year founded and founding story 
- Founder backgrounds and previous ventures 
- Current executive team composition 
- Total funding raised to date (including all previous rounds) 
- Previous investors before this round 

## Business Analysis  
- Detailed description of products/services 
- Primary revenue model (subscription, freemium, transaction fees, etc.) 
- Target customer segments 
- Current estimated customer/user count 
- Estimated annual revenue (if available) 

## Market Position  
- Primary competitors in their space 
- Unique selling proposition/competitive advantage 
- Recent partnerships or major client announcements 
- Market size and growth rate of their industry 
- Their estimated market share Growth Trajectory  
- Employee growth rate over past 1-2 years 
- Geographic expansion plans 
- Recent product launches or roadmap information 
- Any stated plans for the funding (expansion, R&D, etc.) 

## Additional Context  
- Any recent news about the company beyond funding 
- Relevant industry trends affecting their business 
- Notable advisors or board members 
- Any regulatory considerations for their market

assignments.name: system_prompt
assignments.value:
=You are a company research assistant.
Please include sources for all information gathered so I can verify and explore further.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Manualtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Manualtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 19 different services: stickyNote, airtable, merge, outputParserAutofixing, executeWorkflow. It contains 63 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 63
- **Node Types**: 19
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Filter**: filter
- **Structured Output Parser**: outputParserStructured
- **Perplexity**: lmChatOpenRouter
- **Filter1**: filter
- **Extract Structured Data **: informationExtractor
- **Research URL**: chainLlm
- **Extract URL**: chainLlm
- **Merge Extracted Data**: merge
- **Split TC Articles**: splitOut
- ... and 53 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
